TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OleDbCommandBuilder extends System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class OleDbCommandBuilder Inherits DbCommandBuilder
public ref class OleDbCommandBuilder sealed : System::Data::Common::DbCommandBuilder

summary.span: 自动生成用于协调对 的更改与关联数据库的单表命令。

span.span: Automatically generates single-table commands that are used to reconcile changes made to a with the associated database.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会自动生成协调对所做的更改所需的 SQL 语句与关联的数据源。The does not automatically generate the SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a with the associated data source. 但是，可以创建对象来自动生成的单表更新的 SQL 语句，如果您设置属性的。However, you can create an object to automatically generate SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the property of the . 然后，将不设置任何其他 SQL 语句生成的。Then, any additional SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the . 将自身注册为侦听器事件何时设置属性。The registers itself as a listener for events whenever you set the property. 您可以仅将相关联或与每个其他对象一次。You can only associate one or object with each other at one time. 若要生成 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句使用要自动检索一组元数据的属性。To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the uses the property to retrieve a required set of metadata automatically. 如果您更改检索的元数据，如第一次更新，应调用后方法来更新元数据。If you change the after the metadata is retrieved, such as after the first update, you should call the method to update the metadata. 还使用， ，和属性引用的。The also uses the , , and properties referenced by the . 用户应调用如果修改一个或多个这些属性，或如果本身将被替换。The user should call if one or more of these properties are modified, or if the itself is replaced. 否则为， ，和属性保留其以前的值。Otherwise the , , and properties retain their previous values. 如果您调用，则会与其，并且无法再使用生成的命令。If you call , the is disassociated from the , and the generated commands are no longer used. ## Examples 下面的示例使用，以及和，以从数据源选择的行。The following example uses the , along and , to select rows from a data source. 该示例传递一个已初始化，连接字符串、 一个 SQL SELECT 语句，查询字符串和数据源表的名称的字符串。The example is passed an initialized , a connection string, a query string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and a string that is the name of the data source table. 然后该示例创建。The example then creates an . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommandBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommandBuilder/CS/mysample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommandBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommandBuilder/VB/mysample.vb#1)]

param.span: 引用将从其中导出参数信息的存储过程的 。

span.span: The referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.

param.span: 将派生参数添加到 的 集合中。

span.span: The derived parameters are added to the collection of the .

summary.span: 从在 中指定的存储过程中检索参数信息并填充指定的 对象的 集合。

span.span: Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the and populates the collection of the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将覆盖任何现有参数信息。 overwrites any existing parameter information for the . 需要更多调用数据源中获取信息。 requires an additional call to the data source to obtain the information. 如果在提前知道参数信息，则更有效地通过显式设置的信息填充的参数集合。If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly. 您只能使用的存储过程。You can only use with stored procedures. 不能使用填充使用任意 Transact SQL 语句，如参数化 SELECT 语句。You cannot use to populate the with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement. 有关详细信息，请参阅[配置参数和参数数据类型](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md).

exception.span: 基础 OLE DB 提供程序不支持返回存储过程参数信息，命令文本不是有效的存储过程名称，或者指定的 不是 。

span.span: The underlying OLE DB provider does not support returning stored procedure parameter information, the command text is not a valid stored procedure name, or the specified was not .

summary.span: 获取在数据源中执行删除操作所需的自动生成的 对象。

span.span: Gets the automatically generated object required to perform deletions at the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用方法的信息性消息或故障排除目的，因为它返回要执行对象。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 此外可以使用修改命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，可能会调用并修改值，然后上显式设置它。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 首先生成的 SQL 语句后，应用程序必须显式调用如果发生更改以任何方式的语句。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则为将仍将使用从上一语句，这可能不是正确的信息。Otherwise, the will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. SQL 语句将首次生成时应用程序调用任一或。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以使用方法的信息性消息或故障排除目的，因为它返回要执行对象。An application can use the method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the object to be executed. 此外可以使用修改命令的基础。You can also use as the basis of a modified command. 例如，可能会调用并修改值，然后上显式设置它。For example, you might call and modify the value, and then explicitly set that on the . 首先生成的 SQL 语句后，应用程序必须显式调用如果发生更改以任何方式的语句。After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call if it changes the statement in any way. 否则为将仍将使用从上一语句，这可能不是正确的信息。Otherwise, the will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct. SQL 语句将首次生成时应用程序调用任一或。The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either or . 生成参数名称时的默认行为是使用@p1， @p2，为各种参数，依此类推。The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters. 传递`true`有关`useColumnsForParameterNames`参数允许你强制生成改为基于列名称的参数。Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the to generate parameters based on the column names instead. 仅当满足以下条件时，此操作将成功：This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - 已指定并且其长度等于或大于生成的参数名称。The has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name. - 生成的参数名称符合中指定的条件正则表达式。The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the regular expression. - 一个指定。A is specified.

param.span: 当连接是通过时，会导致托管包装从获取 OLE DB 提供程序的引号字符，调用 SQLGetInfo 、、（SQL_IDENTIFIER_QUOTE_CHAR）。

span.span: When a connection is passed, causes the managed wrapper to get the quote character from the OLE DB provider.

param.span: 如果连接未通过时，使用从 和 的值中引用该字符串。

span.span: When no connection is passed, the string is quoted using values from and .

summary.span: 给定了具有正确的目录大小写设置且不带引号的标识符时，返回该标识符的正确的带引号形式。

span.span: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier.

summary.span: 这包括正确地转义该标识符中的任何嵌入引号。

span.span: This includes correctly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
The quoted version of the identifier.

returns.span: 标识符内的嵌入引号被正确地转义。

span.span: Embedded quotes within the identifier are correctly escaped.
